description: Dept. of Labour - Appointed Mr. S. Kariyawasam - Arbitrator to settle the dispute between Mr. C. D. Lankeshwara & Sri Lanka Transport Board - Mr. M. D. K. Kulatunga - Arbitrator - between Mr. J. A. S. Pushpakumara & Mr. A. Wickramanayaka - Mr. S. Wiriththamulla - Mr. D. M. Jayantha & The Associated Newspapers of Ceylon Limited - Mr. S. Lokubogahawatta - Arbitrator between Mr. J. G. M. Karunatilaka and Sri Lanka Mahaweli Authority
